dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on emergent communication through negotiation, exploring how agents develop communication strategies in a negotiation setting.
dcterms:title: Emergent Communication through Negotiation

dcterms:creator: K. Evtimova
A. Drozdov
D. Kiela
K. Cho
dcterms:description: This dataset involves a multi-modal, multi-step referential game where agents must communicate effectively to refer to objects in a shared environment.
dcterms:title: Multi-modal, Multi-step Referential Game

dcterms:creator: K. Bullard
D. Kiela
F. Meier
J. Pineau
J. Foerster
dcterms:description: This dataset explores zero-shot communication, focusing on how agents can communicate effectively without prior training on specific communication tasks.
dcterms:title: Zero-shot Communication

dcterms:creator: R. Chaabouni
E. Kharitonov
E. Dupoux
M. Baroni
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates compositionality and generalization in emergent languages, focusing on how agents develop structured communication.
dcterms:title: Compositionality in Emergent Languages

dcterms:creator: Y. Li
E. M. Ponti
I. VuliÄ‡
A. Korhonen
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for emergent communication pretraining in few-shot machine translation, demonstrating how emergent languages can enhance translation tasks.
dcterms:title: Emergent Language for Pretraining in Few-shot Translation

dcterms:creator: E. Kharitonov
R. Chaabouni
D. Bouchacourt
M. Baroni
dcterms:description: The EGG toolkit is designed for research on the emergence of language in games, providing a framework for conducting experiments in emergent communication.
dcterms:title: EGG Toolkit for Emergent Language Research
